column1: Smoque BBQ////7. Some people have complained about parking
column2: and it's true that at peak times you may have to search on one of the residential blocks to park
column5: Lakeview and many other neighborhoods in Chicago have FAR worse parking situations. I can only assume those complaining about parking here are coming from the suburbs (Smoque is right off the I-90/94 Irving Park exit and a lot of suburbanites stop by on the way to Cubs games). If you actually live in the city
column6: you'll probably think the parking is easy
column7: not to mention completely free--not a parking meter in sight.
